name: SURABI - Strategic Urban Rural Advancement Backing Institute

address: Behind State bank of India, Taylors Road, Kilpauk, Chennai

briefDescription: VISION: To create a better society of sustainable development free from poverty and deprivation.MISSION: To reach out to the poor, marginalized rural and urban people, assess their needs and problems, mobilize resources, network with local, national and international partners and lead them to sustainable development.STRATEGY: It undertakes planning, budgeting, resource mobilization, monitoring, evaluation and reporting, organizing people and networking, integrating research and development in the process.

address: Behind State Bank of India, Taylors Road, Kilpauk, Chennai
